verses.verse: In the tenth<WH6224> year<WH8141>, in the tenth<WH6224> month, in the twelfth<WH8147><WH6240> day of the month<WH2320>, the word<WH1697> of the LORD<WH3068> came unto me, saying<WH559>,
Son<WH1121> of man<WH120>, set<WH7760> thy face<WH6440> against Pharaoh<WH6547> king<WH4428> of Egypt<WH4714>, and prophesy<WH5012> against him, and against all Egypt<WH4714>:

Speak<WH1696>, and say<WH559>, Thus saith<WH559> the Lord<WH136> GOD<WH3069>; Behold, I am against thee, Pharaoh<WH6547> king<WH4428> of Egypt<WH4714>, the great<WH1419> dragon<WH8577> that lieth<WH7257> in the midst<WH8432> of his rivers<WH2975>, which hath said<WH559>, My river<WH2975> is mine own, and I have made<WH6213> it for myself.

But I will put<WH5414> hooks<WH2397><WH2397> in thy jaws<WH3895>, and I will cause the fish<WH1710> of thy rivers<WH2975> to stick<WH1692> unto thy scales<WH7193>, and I will bring thee up<WH5927> out of the midst<WH8432> of thy rivers<WH2975>, and all the fish<WH1710> of thy rivers<WH2975> shall stick<WH1692> unto thy scales<WH7193>.

And I will leave<WH5203> thee thrown into the wilderness<WH4057>, thee and all the fish<WH1710> of thy rivers<WH2975>: thou shalt fall<WH5307> upon the open<WH6440> fields<WH7704>; thou shalt not be brought together<WH622>, nor gathered<WH6908>: I have given<WH5414> thee for meat<WH402> to the beasts<WH2416> of the field<WH776> and to the fowls<WH5775> of the heaven<WH8064>.
And all the inhabitants<WH3427> of Egypt<WH4714> shall know<WH3045> that I am the LORD<WH3068>, because they have been a staff<WH4938> of reed<WH7070> to the house<WH1004> of Israel<WH3478>.

When they took hold<WH8610> of thee by thy hand<WH3709>, thou didst break<WH7533>, and rend<WH1234> all their shoulder<WH3802>: and when they leaned<WH8172> upon thee, thou brakest<WH7665>, and madest all their loins<WH4975> to be at a stand<WH5976>.
¶ Therefore thus saith<WH559> the Lord<WH136> GOD<WH3069>; Behold, I will bring<WH935> a sword<WH2719> upon thee, and cut off<WH3772> man<WH120> and beast<WH929> out of thee.

And the land<WH776> of Egypt<WH4714> shall be desolate<WH8077> and waste<WH2723>; and they shall know<WH3045> that I am the LORD<WH3068>: because he hath said<WH559>, The river<WH2975> is mine, and I have made<WH6213> it.

Behold, therefore I am against thee, and against thy rivers<WH2975>, and I will make<WH5414> the land<WH776> of Egypt<WH4714> utterly<WH2721> waste<WH2723> and desolate<WH8077>, from the tower<WH4024> of Syene<WH5482> even unto the border<WH1366> of Ethiopia<WH3568>.
No foot<WH7272> of man<WH120> shall pass through<WH5674> it, nor foot<WH7272> of beast<WH929> shall pass through<WH5674> it, neither shall it be inhabited<WH3427> forty<WH705> years<WH8141>.

And I will make<WH5414> the land<WH776> of Egypt<WH4714> desolate<WH8077> in the midst<WH8432> of the countries<WH776> that are desolate<WH8074>, and her cities<WH5892> among<WH8432> the cities<WH5892> that are laid waste<WH2717> shall be desolate<WH8077> forty<WH705> years<WH8141>: and I will scatter<WH6327> the Egyptians<WH4714> among the nations<WH1471>, and will disperse<WH2219> them through the countries<WH776>.

¶ Yet thus saith<WH559> the Lord<WH136> GOD<WH3069>; At the end<WH7093> of forty<WH705> years<WH8141> will I gather<WH6908> the Egyptians<WH4714> from the people<WH5971> whither they were scattered<WH6327>:

And I will bring again<WH7725> the captivity<WH7622> of Egypt<WH4714>, and will cause them to return<WH7725> into the land<WH776> of Pathros<WH6624>, into the land<WH776> of their habitation<WH4351>; and they shall be there a base<WH8217> kingdom<WH4467>.

It shall be the basest<WH8217> of the kingdoms<WH4467>; neither shall it exalt<WH5375> itself any more above the nations<WH1471>: for I will diminish<WH4591> them, that they shall no more rule<WH7287> over the nations<WH1471>.

And it shall be no more the confidence<WH4009> of the house<WH1004> of Israel<WH3478>, which bringeth<WH2142> their iniquity<WH5771> to remembrance<WH2142>, when they shall look<WH6437> after<WH310> them: but they shall know<WH3045> that I am the Lord<WH136> GOD<WH3069>.

¶ And it came to pass in the seven<WH7651> and twentieth<WH6242> year<WH8141>, in the first<WH7223> month, in the first<WH259> day of the month<WH2320>, the word<WH1697> of the LORD<WH3068> came unto me, saying<WH559>,

Son<WH1121> of man<WH120>, Nebuchadrezzar<WH5019> king<WH4428> of Babylon<WH894> caused<WH5647> his army<WH2428> to serve<WH5647> a great<WH1419> service<WH5656> against Tyrus<WH6865>: every head<WH7218> was made bald<WH7139>, and every shoulder<WH3802> was peeled<WH4803>: yet had he no wages<WH7939>, nor his army<WH2428>, for Tyrus<WH6865>, for the service<WH5656> that he had served<WH5647> against it:

Therefore thus saith<WH559> the Lord<WH136> GOD<WH3069>; Behold, I will give<WH5414> the land<WH776> of Egypt<WH4714> unto Nebuchadrezzar<WH5019> king<WH4428> of Babylon<WH894>; and he shall take<WH5375> her multitude<WH1995>, and take<WH7997> her spoil<WH7998>, and take<WH962> her prey<WH957>; and it shall be the wages<WH7939> for his army<WH2428>.

I have given<WH5414> him the land<WH776> of Egypt<WH4714> for his labour<WH6468> wherewith he served<WH5647> against it, because they wrought<WH6213> for me, saith<WH5002> the Lord<WH136> GOD<WH3069>.

¶ In that day<WH3117> will I cause<WH6779> the horn<WH7161> of the house<WH1004> of Israel<WH3478> to bud forth<WH6779>, and I will give<WH5414> thee the opening<WH6610> of the mouth<WH6310> in the midst<WH8432> of them; and they shall know<WH3045> that I am the LORD<WH3068>.
